content.label: I used to play this when I was younger, I love it <3
I love bug heroes 1 and 2 how ever please add mercenarys in version 1

I know this is an older game, but that doesn't mean it isn't fun. I am very happy that this is still on the App Store. When I was younger, it was on our second generation iPod and I loved it. I didn't think it would still be in the App Store, but when I recently downloaded it again on a different, much newer device, it worked just as well as it did on the old iPod, to my appreciation. My only complaint, that isn't even a complaint really, just a suggestion, is that when spider does her jump and slice close up move, two of her legs stay on the ground while her body is in the air. You may want to fix that, but it isn't a big deal if you don't. I have yet to try Bug Heroes 2, but I am looking forward to when I do!
I’ve been playing this game for a long time and I Love it can you guys please please make it full screen for iPhone X smax and add more futures please 🙏🏼😭
First off it leaves a beautiful nostalgic feeling overall. I may still be you but I remember playing this when I was 3 and it was great.

One of the best and most immersive games that I've returned to over and over. Needs to be updated for iPhone X and provide support to restore past purchases (there's a loading bug now whenever I press restore purchases. Also crashes to often on iPhone X perhaps bc of lack of support for wider display. Please update and don't let one of my favorite games age and go to waste!

Pretty much the best, most entertaining game on the App Store. I’ve had this game for years and have played it relentlessly. I would give this game 5 stars as it is the perfect RPG with such depth and it’s unique little world and style. I honestly think it outshines big heroes 2, but mostly in the music and simplicity departments. So many good memories. Thanks forsaken media for keeping this awesome bug battling game running for every new iOS system.
This is a phenomenal game, I’ve been playing Bug Heroes for years and really appreciate this game. However, the game constantly crashes making it unplayable because my progress is never saved.

I played this when I was four, five, and six. This game has been on my mind ever sense then. I am a preteen now and I can’t wait to try this game out on a newer device. I had this game on my old I-Pad which was actually the original version.
I never write reviews. But this game deserves a review. I absolutely love this game! I’ve been a fan of this game for a super long time and it never gets old!
your games are amazing and I wanted to know if you are making more.
Great game but you have to mash on buttons to make them work. It’s annoying and gets you killed.

Bug who’s is such a great game and there’s nothing better that feeling of nostalgia. It brings back so many great memories. Just as amazing as I remember it! I know this game has been around for a while and the graphics aren’t the best but Skyrim doesn’t have the best graphics either and look at how great of a game that is! Please take a chance on the game and enjoy.

Ps devs keep updating
I started to play this game almost 5 years ago and I still love it. The only problem is that it crashes and freezes a lot. Pls fix
It’s a great game I must admit. But one major problem is that it constantly freezes for no reason. I cant play for very long before it crashes. This is a problem that NEEDS to be fixed. Please fix it

This game is VERY awesome and fun but playing by your self is kinda boring.so why can you guys make online multiplayer.just when you know you are good at survival you can play survival with people.so when you play online you can play with three people.also plz agree with me I really want to play with my cousins.
Great game and lots of fun to play. If there were one thing I would add, it would be permanent cash with permanent upgrades. The upgrades, would of course, have to be expensive.

So happy they upgraded this to 64 bit.  It doesn't end (like temple run or something), but it is different each time you play.  I can spend an few mins playing here and there with save games, or I can play for an hour straight blowing up bugs and scorpions and snails.  Great times!

Bug heroes 1 will always be my favorite mobile game, I feel it's even better than bug heroes 2 in some aspects. Love the concept of a bug inhabited world with the history scrolls, all in all the lore is fantastic. 10/10
I usually love games like this it's like a pizza it's all good I was just disappointed when I learned that the end was locked behind a paywall other than that I would have given five

All three Bug Heroes games are amazing. In their own right. The original Bug Heroes (this game) as well as Quest are the only 2 games I have EVER bought in-app purchases from, and that says a lot coming from a person with majority free apps. (PS: Termite is my favorite Hero :D)

I've been playing this game for a long time, and it never gets old. My only problem is that you HAVE to spend real money to play as other characters, which I hate. But otherwise, this game may be one of the best games on the App Store, hands down.

This game was from my child hood. I remember playing this with one of my friends when we had sleep overs, and it was amazing! Overall this game is very fun, challenging and very simple and easy to play!
Dumb don't play
I love this app take a update for people can play with iPhone 6 I gave 4 star

Omg it is so fun I have had this game for a long time it so fun but can u add some more modes and should make where we can link up with other iOS like what they with ds's that would be nice 
Me and all my brothers play this we all try to beat our high score on the hard modes
I love it its fun
I got this game and I bought flying bugs and treasure trover but I wanted to restore my purchases but when I restored and I waited an hour nothing happened. I need help

I love this game I bought every pack but there should be a mode where you set what round to go up to and try to reach that round,but not coliseum where it's still endless. Also there should be an endless round (what it is at the moment). LOVE this game.

These aren't really bugs but they need to be fixed. "Bug" number one: Ant. No not really. Problem number one: there's still ads saying "BUG HEROES 2! Coming February 2014!" It's April 2015 and bug heroes 2 is out, you should probably fix that. Problem number two: with the reinforcements pack-thing (which is the best pack to get) let's say I'm playing as pill bug, but when I open up the upgrades menu, it says ladybug on all the abilities O.o problem number three: the store still says "new!" ...It's not new anymore. But this game is really good, I have all three bug heroes games and still play them!

title.label: Best free game on the app store

content.label: This is the best game, great gameplay, awesome art style, and cool settings. Best of all... Free! I bought two map packs because it's such a great game and worm is definitely the best. A must have for any IOS device.

Iv'e been playing this game for a long time now, and i still love it! Thank You for making this game!!! But i would still like for you to put Bug Heroes 2 for devices with 5.0 and up because i'm using an ipad one and cant get bug heroes 2 cause it requires 6.0 and up. But i still like this game, Bug heroes. 👍👍👍😄😄😄

I've been playing this game for over 3 years now just whenever I'm bored with some time to kill I start this game up and go on a bug smashing-fest! I highly recommend this game to anyone who likes RPG or tower defense. Thank you to the makers of this game for doing such a great job!
Multiplier PLZ this game is awesome (:

This game deserves to be the number 1 best game in RPGS gaming.Including the others sequel on bug hero.
